## âœ¨ TÃ­nh nÄƒng ná»•i báº­t

    Dá»… Ä‘á»c, dá»… nhá»› vá»›i cÃº phÃ¡p thÃ¢n thiá»‡n tiáº¿ng Viá»‡t.

## YÃªu cáº§u: 

- Node.js v16.9.0 hoáº·c cao hÆ¡n  
  (Khuyáº¿n nghá»‹: Node.js >= 18 Ä‘á»ƒ tÆ°Æ¡ng thÃ­ch tá»‘t nháº¥t vá»›i `discord.js` vÃ  cÃ¡c thÆ° viá»‡n khÃ¡c)

- [discord.js v14 hoáº·c cao hÆ¡n](https://discord.js.org) (Khuyáº¿n nghá»‹: `discord.js@14.11.0` trá»Ÿ lÃªn Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘áº£m báº£o Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ tÃ­nh nÄƒng)

- Bot cáº§n cÃ³ quyá»n sá»­ dá»¥ng `Embed Links` trong kÃªnh Ä‘á»ƒ gá»­i embed.

- CÃ¡c lá»‡nh cáº§n Ä‘Æ°á»£c xÃ¢y dá»±ng báº±ng Slash Commands (há»— trá»£ `interaction`).

- TÃ¹y chá»n: Äá»ƒ dÃ¹ng `.AutoFromUsers()` vÃ  `.AutoAllOptions()`, báº¡n cáº§n táº¡o lá»‡nh cÃ³ cÃ¡c `UserOption`, `StringOption`, `ChannelOption`, v.v.

## ğŸ“¦ cÃ¡ch dÃ¹ng

```js

1. Khá»Ÿi táº¡o EmbedBRB

const { EmbedBRB } = require('embed-brb');
```

```js

2. Táº¡o embed cÆ¡ báº£n

const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
    .Mau('xanh') // MÃ u: tÃªn tiáº¿ng Viá»‡t, tiáº¿ng Anh, HEX hoáº·c sá»‘
    .Tieude('ChÃ o má»«ng!') // TiÃªu Ä‘á»
    .Noidung('ÄÃ¢y lÃ  má»™t vÃ­ dá»¥ embed cÆ¡ báº£n') // Ná»™i dung
    .Chantrang('BRB Studio'); // ChÃ¢n trang
```

```js

3. ThÃªm áº£nh Ä‘áº¡i diá»‡n (Avatar) vÃ  áº£nh lá»›n (Anh)

const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
    .Avatar('https://example.com/avatar.jpg') // HÃ¬nh nhá» bÃªn pháº£i
    .Anh('https://example.com/banner.jpg');   // HÃ¬nh lá»›n bÃªn dÆ°á»›i
```

```js

4. ThÃªm tÃ¡c giáº£ (Tg)

const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
    .Tacgia(bot.displayName, bot.displayAvatarURL()); // hoáº·c thay báº±ng thÃ´ng tin ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng, lÃ  nd thay bot
```

```js

5. ThÃªm trÆ°á»ng thÃ´ng tin (Tr)

const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
    .Truong(
        { name: 'NgÆ°á»i chÆ¡i', value: 'CÆ¡n MÆ°a Láº¡', inline: true },
        { name: 'Tráº¡ng thÃ¡i', value: 'Äang chiáº¿n Ä‘áº¥u', inline: true }
    );
```

```js

6. ThÃªm thá»i gian (tg_guitn)

const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
    .tg_guitn(); // tg_guitn = .setTimestamp()
```

```js

7. DÃ¹ng mÃ u tiáº¿ng Viá»‡t hoáº·c HEX

    .Mau('há»“ng');
    .Mau('#ff9900');
    .Mau(0xff0000);
```

```js

8. Tá»± Ä‘á»™ng láº¥y táº¥t cáº£ user option tá»« interaction (AutoFromUsers)

    const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
        .AutoFromUsers(); // Tá»± thÃªm cÃ¡c option ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng vÃ o embed (stringOptions)
```

```js

9. Tá»± Ä‘á»™ng láº¥y má»i loáº¡i option (AutoAllOptions)

    const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
        .AutoAllOptions(); // Gá»“m: string, number, boolean, user, role, channel,...
```

```js

10. DÃ¹ng .ThemLuaChon() Ä‘á»ƒ thÃªm keyâ€“value tÃ¹y Ã½

    const thongDiep = int.options.getString('thongdiep');
    const embed = new EmbedBRB(int)
    .Mau('blue')
    .Tieude('TiÃªu Ä‘á» vÃ­ dá»¥ 1')
    .ThemLuaChon('Thá»i gian', new Date().toLocaleString()) // Embed sáº½ tá»± Ä‘á»™ng .addFields: Thá»i gian
    .ThemLuaChon('Ná»™i dung', thongDiep) // Embed sáº½ tá»± Ä‘á»™ng .addFields: Ná»™i dung.
    .tg_guitn();


    const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
        .ThemLuaChon('vÃ­ dá»¥ 2', 'viáº¿t trá»±c tiáº¿p vÃ o Ä‘Ã¢y, khÃ´ng cáº§n cÃ¡c string, number, boolean, user, role, channel,...');


```

```js

11. Tráº£ vá» káº¿t quáº£

    await interaction.reply({
            tnn: [embed]
        });

    await interaction.editReply({
            tnn: [embed]
        });
```

```js

12. VÃ­ dá»¥ hoÃ n chá»‰nh

const { SlashCommandBuilder } = require('discord.js');
const { EmbedBRB } = require('embed-brb');

/*
    trong Ä‘Ã³:

        .Mau(color: string|number) â€“ thiáº¿t láº­p mÃ u (há»— trá»£ tiáº¿ng Viá»‡t/Anh, hex, 0xâ€¦).

        .Tieude(title: string) â€“ tiÃªu Ä‘á».

        .Noidung(description: string) â€“ ná»™i dung chÃ­nh.

        .Truong(...fields) â€“ thÃªm trÆ°á»ng (fields).

        .Tacgia(name, iconURL, url?) â€“ thiáº¿t láº­p tÃ¡c giáº£.

        .Avatar(url), .Anh(url) â€“ thiáº¿t láº­p thumbnail vÃ  áº£nh lá»›n.

        .Chantrang(text, iconURL?) â€“ footer.

        .tg_guitn() â€“ tá»± thÃªm timestamp.

        .ThemLuaChon(key, value) â€“ thÃªm thá»§ cÃ´ng trÆ°á»ng tÃªn/key.

        .AutoFromUsers() â€“ tá»± get & hiá»ƒn thá»‹ táº¥t cáº£ UserOption (mention + tÃªn hiá»ƒn thá»‹).

        .AutoAllOptions() â€“ tá»± get & hiá»ƒn thá»‹ báº¥t ká»³ option nÃ o converter thÃ nh string.

        (Viáº¿t ná»™i dung embed ngáº¯n gá»n, dá»… hiá»ƒu hÆ¡n thay vÃ¬ interaction.user, interaction.guild, interaction.member, v.v.)
        bot = interaction.client.user;  // Bot hiá»‡n táº¡i
        nd = interaction.user;          // NgÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng (ngÆ°á»i gá»i lá»‡nh)
        mc = interaction.guild;         // MÃ¡y chá»§ (guild)
        ndsv = interaction.member;      // Member trong server (cÃ³ roles, permissions...)

*/

module.exports = {
    data: new SlashCommandBuilder()
        .setName('vidu')
        .setDescription('cÃ¡ch sá»­ dá»¥ng thÆ° viá»‡n embed-brb'),

    async execute(interaction) {

        await interaction.deferReply({ ephemeral: true });

        // Sá»­ dá»¥ng EmbedBRB
        const embed = new EmbedBRB(interaction)
            .Mau(`xanh_Ä‘áº¹p`) // mÃ u sáº¯c cÃ³ thá»ƒ viáº¿t tiáº¿ng Viá»‡t hoáº·c tiáº¿ng Anh. vÃ­ dá»¥: 'xanh_Ä‘áº¹p' hoáº·c 'cyan'
            .Tieude(`TiÃªu Ä‘á»`) // TiÃªu Ä‘á»
            .Noidung(`Bot ${bot.username} chÃ o báº¡n ${nd.username} Ä‘áº¿n vá»›i mÃ¡y chá»§ ${mc.name}!`) // Ná»™i dung
            .Truong(
                { name: `NgÆ°á»i chÆ¡i`, value: `CÆ¡n MÆ°a Láº¡`, inline: true },
                { name: `Tráº¡ng thÃ¡i`, value: `Äang chiáº¿n Ä‘áº¥u`, inline: true }
            ) // TrÆ°á»ng thÃ´ng tin
            .Tacgia(bot.displayName, bot.displayAvatarURL()) // TÃ¡c giáº£
            .Avatar(nd.displayAvatarURL({ dynamic: true })) // HÃ¬nh áº£nh nhá» cá»§a ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng (cÃ³ thá»ƒ thay báº±ng link áº£nh)
            .Anh(mc.iconURL({ dynamic: true, size: 512 })) // HÃ¬nh áº£nh lá»›n (áº£nh mÃ¡y chá»§ hoáº·c link áº£nh)
            .Chantrang(`BRB Studio â€¢ Valheim Server`) // ChÃ¢n trang tuá»³ biáº¿n
            .tg_guitn(); // ThÃªm timestamp
            
        await interaction.editReply({
            tnn: [embed],
        });
    }
};
```
